query: SELECT q.name, q.slug, qds.backgroundImage FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN quiz_design_settings qds ON q.id = qds.quizId ORDER BY q.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user b5yJbKNBA74GJz4.0729dd994af9 --database EcCrELAaL5JgQGs8z45yv6 --execute SELECT q.name, q.slug, qds.backgroundImage FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN quiz_design_settings qds ON q.id = qds.quizId ORDER BY q.id;
